InclusionRules.name: No Platelet count > 100 on index date
No major autoimmune disorders (RA, MS, Psoriasis, SLE, CD, UC, Addisons, Graves, Sjogren, Myasthenia Gravis, Vasculitis, Celiac)
No Pregnancy related HELLP syndrome (in past 3 months)
No tumors of hematopoietic cells including lymphoma, leukemia, myeloma and related
No Pancytopenia or bone marrow disorder diagnosis within 7 days
No Neutropenia, Agranulocytosis diagnosis within 7 days
No low neutrophil count within 7 days
No low Hemoglobin measurement in blood within 7 days
No low Hematocrit measurement in blood within 7 days
